headline: Norfolk Southern's derailment insurance payments provide boost but even without that profits were up
summary: Last year, the first quarter results of $53 million, or 23 cents per share, were held down by the $600 million class action settlement the railroad agreed to pay residents near the East Palestine derailment.  Since last year's second quarter, Norfolk Southern has been consistently collecting more in insurance payments than it was spending on the derailment cleanup and response, so its bottom line has received a boost each of the last several quarters.

headline: Norfolk Southern Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: Norfolk Southern Corporation (NYSE: NSC) announced today a quarterly dividend of $1.35 per share on its common stock.

headline: Supreme Court turns down CSX antitrust suit against Norfolk Southern
summary: The U.S. Supreme Court declined to hear a CSX appeal regarding an antitrust suit over access to Norfolk International Terminals. The post Supreme Court turns down CSX antitrust suit against Norfolk Southern appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Norfolk Southern Declares Quarterly Dividend, Payable on May 20, 2025
summary: Norfolk Southern Corporation announced a quarterly dividend of $1.35 per share on its common stock. The dividend is payable May 20, 2025, to shareholders of record on May 2, 2025....
